title: How to Waste $714.66 on Amazon...
description: Go to  to get your new unlimitedwireless plan for just $30 a month. Brought to you by Mint Mobile. Were celebrating Kens birthday in true Mystery Tech fashion.   Kens very cool LED glasses on Amazon:  Sony MDR ZX110 headphones on Amazon:  The budget USB-C DAC on Amazon:  Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones on Amazon:  Robotosaur on Amazon:  Bob Ross toaster on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
